It's probably worth merging this and re-running tests.
This is now built on top of #11352.


I think I've just discovered something about where the additional lock contention in this PR is coming from.  I had originally assumed that it was coming from the additional callback being invoked on the combiner.  However, while working on #11352, I made a change that caused us to call grpc_polling_entity_add_to_pollset_set() and grpc_polling_entity_del_from_pollset_set() even in the synchronous case, and it resulted in almost exactly the same amount of increased lock contention being reported for this PR.  I have reverted that change from the other PR, but I now suspect that the additional lock contention in this PR is actually due to the pollset_set modification, not to invoking a new callback on the combiner.

Craig, any thoughts on how we might address this?

I've put it on the back burner for now.  I'll come back to it at some point in the future.
This PR is now sufficiently out of date that if I do ever decide to pick this up again, I will wind up starting over anyway, so I'm going to close it.
